member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.RawPixelBufferLayout
member.summary: Raw pixel buffer layout to be used with the ToPixelBuffer method when serializing multi-planar images into a pixel buffer.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.RawPixelBufferLayout.Interleaved
member.summary: Generate interleaved memory layout, i. e. the resulting buffer will contain the pixel data for all planes for position (0, 0), followed by all planes for position (1, 0) and so on.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.RawPixelBufferLayout.Planar
member.summary: Generate planar memory layout, i. e. the resulting buffer contain all the pixel data for plane 0 followed by all the pixel data for plane 1 and so on.

member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.ImageExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods on the object.

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.ImageExtensions.GetPixel(Stemmer.Cvb.Image,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Gets the pixel values of all planes at the given position.
member.returns: The pixel values; if the value could not be dereferenced.

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.ImageExtensions.ToBitmap(Stemmer.Cvb.Image,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat,Stemmer.Cvb.Rect,Stemmer.Cvb.PlaneConfiguration,System.Double,System.Int32,Stemmer.Cvb.HighBitScaleMode)
member.summary: Create a from this CVB image.
member.param: Width of the Bitmap to be returned; may be 0, in which case the width is calculated taking into account the aspect ratio of this image (if height != 0) or will be set to the width of this image(if width and height are 0)

Height of the Bitmap to be returned; may be 0, in which case the height is calculated taking into account the aspect ratio of this image (if width != 0) or will be set to the height of this image (if width and height are 0)
Subregion of the image to paint into the bmData
Plane configuration to use for painting
Treatment for images with more than 8 bits per pixel
member.exception: If this image has already been disposed

member.summary: Convert this into a of selectable size.

Height of the Bitmap to be returned; may be 0, in which case the height is calculated taking into account the aspect ratio of this image (if width != 0) or will be set to the height of this image (if width and height are 0)
Treatment for images with more than 8 bits per pixel

member.summary: Convert this into a of identical size.

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.ImageExtensions.ToPixelBuffer``1(Stemmer.Cvb.Image,Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.RawPixelBufferLayout)
member.summary: Create a byte buffer with the serialized image pixel data.
member.typeparam: Type of the pixel array to produce. Must match the type of the pixels as described by the image's data type descriptor.
member.param: Image object for which the pixels are to be serialized. Note that the input image must have the same data type on all input planes and that the data type must be mappable to one of the native CLR types.
Plane layout to use when serializing the image's pixel data (actual setting will not have an effect on images with only one plane).
member.returns: Array with the serialized pixel data
member.exception: if the is multi-planar and the different planes have different data type(s) or if the data type of the plane(s) of the is/are not compatible with the TPixel generic parameter

member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace and assembly Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions contains static classes with extension methods that make cooperation with other APIs like System.Drawing. Please note that the assembly Stemmer.Cvb.Extensions.dll is dependent on other assemblies that may not be present on all supported platforms.
